column4: can anyone tell me how to access a printer on one machine from another machine?
maybe CUPS will help? Visit the admin interface at the following address in your web browser:  http://localhost:631/
using the IP number is probably the best bet
IP instead of the computer name
ohh, wanna link me to the guide you are using?
and what exactly was it you are trying to do?
your server is what OS and the one you are try to connect from is what OS?
not really sorry. Hopefully the info you provided will help others to help you :)
im gonna try ipp instead of printers in the path
i set up samba and the other unix file sharing thing... but they only worked for a day
you can install the edubuntu-desktop on top of ubuntu
